message: It would be so much better if the iPhone app would have the Mark as read button as the Reeder app and not like a pop up message.
You can also change this preference in the Reeder settings.
However, I am happy enough with what you have done already - thanks!

@ericflo the first time you mark as read in Reeder you are asked if you want to skip confirmation for the future. So just pressing the mark as read button will immediately mark as read and move back to previous screen, no confirmation pop-up required.
